subject: RE: [junit] Passing Arguments to an ANT Buildfile
msgSnippet: ... That s unnecessarily complicated. Simply use  Properties can t be overridden, so if it is already set (for
messageBody:
Timothy Wall wrote:
> Here's one option, others are probably available using "if" and
> "condition":
>
> <target name="default-value" unless="testfile">
> <property name="testfile" value="default-value"/>
> </target>

That's unnecessarily complicated. Simply use

<property name="testfile" value="default-value"/>

Properties can't be overridden, so if it is already set (for example
from the command line), it still would have the original value.

Regards, Ilja
